page.title: 03INDUSTRY
page.content: A.R.C.Eastern is a one man plant producing concrete which is made from granite agrigates from the neighbouring Dalbeattie Quarry,washed concrete and sand from Lauriestone and Locharbriggs and cement from Blue Circle which have works all over the U.K..The cement is used for construction in general including agricultural and road making.The concrete is transported in truck mixers which come to the works to collect ingredients for concrete which they mix en route to the site where it is required.
